org.mindswap.owls.validator
Class OWLSValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.mindswap.owls.validator.OWLSValidator

public class OWLSValidator
extends java.lang.Object

Implements validation of OWL-S services including their process, profile, and grounding for missing elements, inconsistencies, or other incorrect specifications.

The set of validation rules is currently hard coded by this class, i.e., there is no extension mechanism to plug-in new rules. IMPROVE implement extensible (and rule based) validation approach.

Method Detail

validate

public ValidationReport validate(OWLOntology theOntology)
                          throws ValidationException
Query the given ontology for all OWL-S service instances and validate them according to the rules implemented by this class.

Note that a Pellet reasoner will be temporarily attached to the backing KB if there was none before; it will be detached upon return.

Parameters:
theOntology - The ontology containing (either directly or by imported ontologies) the services to validate.
Returns:
A validation report about the service(s) found.
Throws:
ValidationException - See ValidationException.Error for the different kinds of events that may cause this exception.

validate

public ValidationReport validate(java.lang.String theURI)
                          throws ValidationException
Read a OWL-S document from the given resource (in fact, the string is assumed to be a URL) and validate it according to the rules implemented by this class.

Parameters:
theURI - The location of the OWL-S document to validate.
Returns:
A validation report about the service(s) found in the document.
Throws:
ValidationException - See ValidationException.Error for the different kinds of events that may cause this exception.

validate

public ValidationReport validate(java.net.URI theURI)
                          throws ValidationException
Read a OWL-S document from the given resource (in fact, the URI is assumed to be a URL) and validate it according to the rules implemented by this class.

Parameters:
theURI - The location of the OWL-S document to validate.
Returns:

Throws:
